reviews.review: Jogo excelente, mas tem muitos hacks

CS:GO is such an cool game but there is some issue i would like to share that is hackers i would like to say to Valve you should add an Anticheat, well there're also MM problems Silvers are MMing with GN3 like what the fuck is this? Can Silvers fight with GN3? Are you fucking serious?
i like this game very well.
